name: Blawhite Box
description:
*Challenge your friends and family!

*Collect keys and exchange them to 1 of 16 amazing effects!

*Defeat your opponent as fast as you can!

Sounds great? Give it a try!

***Please note that "Blawhite Box" is our first game and you may encounter some bugs or glitches. We would be grateful if you could let us know about it. Please e-mail us at blawhitebox@gmail.com

You can also download this game on your android device. Link is provided.
